content: bulky photographer hat by lavanya patricella the photographer hat was originally designed in worsted weight yarn and has been my go to slouch hat pattern for years i wanted a heavier weight version for winter so now it s available in bulky weight yarn too it s a simple hat that is great for guys gals and all our other pals size 20 x 10-12 50 8 x 25 4-30 4cm you will want around 2-4 5-10 1cm negative ease materials 100-130 yards 91 4 -
